mapper.sql: id, new_type_id, title, description, user_id, author, is_del, status, modify_time, create_time, news_cover, file, page_view, praise_view,content,url,orignfrom,editor,originUrl
mapper.select:
select count(id) as count from news_jtyy
title LIKE concat(concat("%",#{title}),"%")
and date(create_time) >= #{start} and #{end} >= date(create_time) and new_type_id=#{newTypeId} and is_del=0
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update news_jtyy
new_type_id = #{newTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

praise_view = #{praiseView,jdbcType=INTEGER},

url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orignfrom = #{orignfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
editor = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
originUrl = #{originUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
